post.title: maximum card(sdhc) capcity for a g9
post.content: hi all i bot a g9 afr i got alot of advise here n im very happy with it .... although i find on vacation my memory card is too small for me i have serched quite a bit on the net , but am unable to find what the maximum capacity for the g9 is i want to buy a sandisk extreme sdhc card ....... i can afford the 8 gb but cannot find if that size will b compatible with the camera i plan to buy it online , so that it will b cheaper ... but dont want to find out when i get the card that it is not compatible also will the 16 gb b compatile tooo ? googled it ... but nooone seems to being staright answers to other ppls q uestions plz do help asap ... i really want to get tat new card in my hands b4 next weekend when im off for a family event !!! regards
